"Have you tried your hand at Gathering?": "Outside the City, there's a wealth of vegetables, fruits, Ores and Tames meat to be harvested."
"Those fresh ingredients and strong materials are sure to benefit you in your battles to come."
"Just something to think about. Take it easy!"
"Personally, I like mining. I don't get much free time, but when I do, I often use it to survey a region for its Ores."
"Actually, I've been meaning to give you a bunch of pointers about Ores. What do you say?"
"Monotite, for example, is known for its brilliant red shine."
"Just looking at it is enjoyable enough, but it also has uses at the Item Lab for bringing your equipment to life through Enhancement."
"Different pieces of equipment may require different kinds of Ore, so make sure you check the Lab's menu to know what you'll need."
"Monotite can be found in generally any rocky areas in Central Aelio. Why not go and try looking for some?"
"Well, if you ever want to learn about Ores, you know where to find me."
